tool_description: Rotate, resize, flip, and manipulate images.
name: Manipic
title: Manipic

api_list.name: Resize
api_list.description:
###Resize image to width, height or width x height.

**Parameters:**

`width: number ? ` pixels wide the resultant image should be. don't send this parameter to auto-scale the width to match the height.

`height: number ? ` pixels high the resultant image should be. don't send this parameter to auto-scale the height to match the width.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://manipic.p.rapidapi.com/resize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "manipic.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://manipic.p.rapidapi.com/resize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "manipic.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Blur
api_list.description:
###Blur the image

**Parameters:**

`sigma: number ` a value between 0.3 and 1000 representing the sigma of the Gaussian mask, where `sigma = 1 + radius / 2`
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://manipic.p.rapidapi.com/blur"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "manipic.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://manipic.p.rapidapi.com/blur"

api_list.name: Add Border
api_list.description:
###Add custom border to the image.

**Parameters:**

`color: hex` color of the border.

`width: number ` width of the border.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://manipic.p.rapidapi.com/addBorder"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "manipic.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Flip
api_list.description:
###Flip the image about the vertical Y axis or about the horizontal X axis.

**Parameters:**

`axis: AXIS_ENUM ` indicate wether to flip about the vertical of horizontal axis.

```
enum AXIS_ENUM {
    X
    Y
}
```
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://manipic.p.rapidapi.com/flip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "manipic.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Rotate
api_list.description:
###Rotate the image by an explicit angle

**Parameters:**

`angle: number ` angle of rotation.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://manipic.p.rapidapi.com/rotate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "manipic.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
